documentation.text:
@title FiatToken V2
 @notice ERC20 Token backed by fiat reserves, version 2

@notice Initialize v2
 @param newName   New token name

attributes.text:
@title FiatToken V2
 @notice ERC20 Token backed by fiat reserves, version 2

@notice Initialize v2
 @param newName   New token name

authorizationState(address,bytes32).details: Nonces are randomly generated 32-byte data unique to the authorizer's address

returns._0: True if the nonce is used

balanceOf(address).details: Get token balance of an account

burn(uint256).details: allows a minter to burn some of its own tokens Validates that caller is a minter and that sender is not blacklisted amount is less than or equal to the minter's account balance

params._amount: uint256 the amount of tokens to be burned

cancelAuthorization(address,bytes32,uint.details: Works only if the authorization is not yet used.

configureMinter(address,uint256).details: Function to add/update a new minter

params.minterAllowedAmount: The minting amount allowed for the minter

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

isMinter(address).details: Checks if account is a minter

params._amount: The amount of tokens to mint. Must be less than or equal to the minterAllowance of the caller.
params._to: The address that will receive the minted tokens.

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

minterAllowance(address).details: Get minter allowance for an account

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

params.deadline: Expiration time, seconds since the epoch

receiveWithAuthorization(address,address.details: This has an additional check to ensure that the payee's address matches the caller of this function to prevent front-running attacks.

params.validAfter: The time after which this is valid (unix time)
params.validBefore: The time before which this is valid (unix time)

params.minter: The address of the minter to remove

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params.validAfter: The time after which this is valid (unix time)
params.validBefore: The time before which this is valid (unix time)

params._account: The address to remove from the blacklist

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

allowance(address,address).notice: Amount of remaining tokens spender is allowed to transfer on behalf of the token owner

approve(address,uint256).notice: Set spender's allowance over the caller's tokens to be a given value.

authorizationState(address,bytes32).notice: Returns the state of an authorization

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Decrease the allowance by a given decrement

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Increase the allowance by a given increment

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Update allowance with a signed permit

receiveWithAuthorization(address,address.notice: Receive a transfer with a signed authorization from the payer

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue ERC20 tokens locked up in this contract.

transferWithAuthorization(address,addres.notice: Execute a transfer with a signed authorization

updateRescuer(address).notice: Assign the rescuer role to a given address.

userdoc.notice: ERC20 Token backed by fiat reserves, version 2
